update yk_dentist
default_city_id = #{default_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
default_select_city_id = #{default_select_city_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hosp_id = #{hospId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
title_id = #{titleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
small_img_url = #{smallImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

wxpubcode = #{wxpubcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

outid = #{outid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update yk_dentist set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hosp_id = #{hospId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title_id = #{titleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, small_img_url = #{smallImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastvisitd = #{lastvisitd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, qrcodeid = #{qrcodeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, style_id = #{styleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unionid = #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_url = #{cardUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cookie = #{cookie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, confirm_img = #{confirmImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, confirm_stat = #{confirmStat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xplatform = #{xplatform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channelid = #{channelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wxpubcode = #{wxpubcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, push_token = #{pushToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outid = #{outid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outsysid = #{outsysid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dent2c_flag = #{dent2cFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transferStatus = #{transferStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, device_tokens = #{deviceTokens,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pub_id = #{pubId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, card_img = #{cardImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select den.* from yk_dentist den,yk_dentist_morepoint mor where mor.comfort_flag = 2 and den.id = mor.did

SELECT d.id, d.username, d.mobile, d.password, d.dept_id, d.hosp_id, d.title_id, d.sex, d.birthday, d.small_img_url, d. img_url, d.email, d.remark, d.created, d.lastvisitd, d.qrcodeid, d.open_id, d.style_id, d.unionid, d. card_url, d.cookie, d.user_type, d.confirm_img, d.confirm_stat, d.xplatform, d.channelid, d.city, d. province, d.wxpubcode, d.push_token, d.outid, d.outsysid, d.dent2c_flag, d.transferStatus, d.device_tokens, d.pub_id, d.default_city_id, d.card_img FROM yk_dentist d LEFT JOIN yk_card_doc cd ON d.`id` = cd.`doc_id`
